summary: This document is a daily press clipping summary from the SDNY (Southern District of New York) dated February 12, 2021. It lists headlines from various news outlets, including one specifically related to the Epstein case: 'Massage testimony Ghislaine Maxwell fought to conceal is unsealed' from Bloomberg. The summary also includes other unrelated legal and political news.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of a news headline regarding testimony she fought to conceal being unsealed.

persons.name: Stefan Qin
persons.context: Mentioned in a Bloomberg headline about a Ponzi scheme that cost investors millions.

persons.name: Peter Nygard
persons.context: Subject of a Discovery+ documentary exploring his sex trafficking charges.

events.title: Unsealing of Maxwell testimony
events.description: Testimony that Ghislaine Maxwell fought to conceal is unsealed, as reported in a Bloomberg news clip.

keyFacts: The document is a press clipping summary from the SDNY dated February 12, 2021.
A headline indicates that testimony Ghislaine Maxwell fought to conceal was unsealed.
The summary includes various other legal and political news headlines unrelated to the Epstein case.
